weight: Approx. 6.98 oz. (198 g) (including the batteries and memory card)
focusingrange: Auto & Manual Focus, 1.2 in (3 cm) - infinity (W), 12 in (30 cm) - infinity (T)
powersource: Rechargeable Battery Pack NB-5L OR Compact Power Adapter CA-DC10 (included with AC Adapter Kit ACK-DC30)
continuousshooting: Approx. 2.3 shots/sec. (in P mode); Approx. 9.6 shots/sec. (in High-Speed Burst HQ)*
movie: Normal Playback, Special Playback, Editing, Auto Rotate, Resume
other: Memory card slot; direct connection to Canon and SELPHY Compact Photo Printers, PIXMA Photo Printers and PictBridge-compatible printers via camera's USB 2.0 Hi-Speed cable
exposurecontrolmethod: Program AE, i-Contrast, Manual; AE Lock, Program Shift, Safety Shift, Auto ISO Shift
whitebalancecontrol: Auto*, Day Light, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Flash, Underwater, Custom
autofocussystem: TTL Autofocus, Manual (Shooting standby only in movie mode.)
lcdmonitor: 3.0-inch TFT Color with wide viewing angle
shootingmodes: C, M, Av, Tv, P, Auto*1, SCN*2, Creative Filters *3, Movie*4
flashmodes: Auto, Auto w/ Red-eye Reduction, Flash On, Flash On w/ Red-eye Reduction, Flash Off; FE lock, Safety FE, Slow Synchro
fileformat: Design rule for Camera File system, DPOF (Version 1.1) compliant
